Constants module

Collection of constants used throughout the PipeLab project.

constants.mca_star = 'mca*'

algorithms

constants.up = (0, 1)

+y

constants.down = (0, -1)

-y

constants.right = (1, 0)

+x

constants.left = (-1, 0)

-x

constants.valid_directions = {(-1, 0), (0, -1), (0, 1), (1, 0)}

all used directions in PipeLab modules

constants.horizontal_directions = {(-1, 0), (1, 0)}

all horizontal directions used in PipeLab modules

constants.vertical_directions = {(0, -1), (0, 1)}

all vertical directions used in PipeLab modules

constants.v_up = <0, 1, 0>

Vpython up

constants.v_down = <0, -1, 0>

Vpython down

constants.v_right = <1, 0, 0>

Vpython right

constants.v_left = <-1, 0, 0>

Vpython left

constants.to_vpy_vec = {(-1, 0): <-1, 0, 0>, (0, -1): <0, -1, 0>, (0, 1): <0, 1, 0>, (1, 0): <1, 0, 0>}

dict for transforming tuple directions to Vpython directions

constants.rot_90 = 1.5707963267948966

rotate by 90°

constants.rot_180 = 3.141592653589793

rotate by 180°

constants.rot_270 = -1.5707963267948966

rotate by 270°

constants.fitting_id = 0

fitting id convention

constants.fit_event_code = 1

Fitting placed

constants.pipe_event_code = 2

Pipe placed

constants.att_event_code = 3

Attachment placed

constants.pick_robot_event_code = 4

Part picked from robot

constants.pick_manual_event_code = 5

Part picked manually
